sourcesContent:
// eslint-disable-next-line import/no-anonymous-default-export
export default {
  API: {
    //BaseURL: 'http://localhost:8080',   
    BaseURL: 'https://gstest.olbius.com',
    Login: '/rest/s1/gsources/login',
    Logout: '/rest/logout',

    // gsources common api
    GetUserProfile: '/rest/s1/gsources/getUserProfile',
    QuickSearch: '/rest/s1/gsources/quickSearch',
    SearchProducts: '/rest/s1/gsources/searchProducts',
    GetUserGroupMember: '/rest/s1/gsources/getUserGroupMember',
    GetProductStores: '/rest/s1/gsources/getProductStores',

    GetStatusItems: '/rest/s1/gsources/getStatusItems',

    GetOrganization: '/rest/s1/gsources/getOrganization',

    GSources: {
      Orders: '/rest/s1/gsources/orders'
    },
    Logistic: {
      DeliveryClusters: '/rest/s1/log/deliveryClusters',

    AddOrderPartPayment: '/rest/s1/pos/addOrderPartPayment',
    GetTentativeOrderIfAny: '/rest/s1/pos/getTentativeOrderIfAny',
    UpdateOrderCustomerPartyId: '/rest/s1/pos/updateOrderCustomerPartyId',
    HoldOrder: '/rest/s1/pos/holdOrder',
    ReopenOrder: '/rest/s1/pos/reopenOrder',
    CancelOrder: '/rest/s1/pos/cancelOrder',
    CompleteOrder: '/rest/s1/pos/completeOrder',
    GetHeldOrderList: '/rest/s1/pos/getHeldOrderList',
    DeleteOrderItem: '/rest/s1/pos/deleteOrderItem',
    GetOrderDetail_POS: '/rest/s1/pos/getOrderDetail',
    GetCustomerInfo_POS: '/rest/s1/pos/getCustomerInfo',
    GetPromoList_POS: '/rest/s1/pos/getPromoList',

    Parties_Acc: '/rest/s1/acc/parties',
    Products_Acc: '/rest/s1/acc/products',
    Payments_Acc: '/rest/s1/acc/payments',
    TimePeriod_Acc: '/rest/s1/acc/timePeriod',

    // gsources purchase api
    GetPurchasingOrders: '/rest/s1/pur/getPurchasingOrders',

    CreateSaleEmployee: '/rest/s1/sales/createSaleEmployee',
    GetPersonalCustomerDetail: '/rest/s1/sales/getPersonalCustomerDetail',
    GetPersonalCustomers: '/rest/s1/sales/getPersonalCustomers',
    getProducts: '/rest/s1/sales/allProducts',
    GetProductDimensions: '/rest/s1/sales/getProductDimensions',
    GetProductPrice: '/rest/s1/sales/getProductPrice',
    GetCategoryList: '/rest/s1/sales/getCategoryList',
    GetProductDetail: '/rest/s1/sales/getProductDetail',
    GetStoreOrg: '/rest/s1/sales/getStoreOrg',
    ChangeStatusParty: '/rest/s1/sales/changeStatusParty',
    CreatePromotion: '/rest/s1/sales/createPromotion',
    GetCategoryListRollup: '/rest/s1/sales/getCategoryListRollup',
    GetOrderList: '/rest/s1/sales/getOrderList',
    ExpiredPromotion: '/rest/s1/sales/expiredPromotion',
    CancelOrder_Sales: '/rest/s1/sales/cancelOrder',
    ApproveOrder: '/rest/s1/sales/approveOrder',
    GetPromotionFromProductId: '/rest/s1/sales/getPromotionFromProductId',
    GetPromoRules: '/rest/s1/sales/getPromoRules',

    // gsources logistic api
    GetFacilitiesWithDateConfig_Log: '/rest/s1/log/getFacilitiesWithDateConfig',
    GetListProductFacilityUseView_Log: '/rest/s1/log/getListProductFacilityUseView',
    GetAllFacilities_Log: '/rest/s1/log/getAllFacilities',
    SetProductFacility_Log: '/rest/s1/log/setProductFacility',
    DeliveryCluster_Log: '/rest/s1/log/deliveryCluster',
    DeliveryClusterDetail_Log: '/rest/s1/log/deliveryClusterDetail',
    DeliveryClusterDetailView_Log: '/rest/s1/log/deliveryClusterDetailView',
    CreateDeliveryCluster_Log: '/rest/s1/log/createDeliveryCluster',

  },
  RESPONSE_CODES: {

    },
    ERROR: {

      NOT_FOUND: 404,
    },
  },
  GGMAPS: {
    // key: 'AIzaSyCn-lJMCW0MBvwGh73tXDWtHWy4mhsbgmk'
    key: 'AIzaSyCHu4vQUKFsMnqpjk_HHjIIAU_yejvT5cs'
  },
  COLOR: [
    '#AC9328', '#223447', '#9603B0', '#3EF849', '#889966', '#3657EB', '#698B4B', '#A98B32', '#BEDFA0', '#DD659F',
    '#90B68F', '#78BD76', '#8D7A5B', '#62D771', '#9F233E', '#05E9D8', '#4E5E8C', '#55FE17', '#14C0D4', '#797030',
    '#22EA4E', '#3DCABB', '#9D5339', '#2EE378', '#3C86BA', '#98DC19', '#9CE80C', '#BE2500', '#BE6B26', '#DABC25',
    '#8DBA3E', '#B71580', '#B4877D', '#925CD4', '#A39ABF', '#285006', '#6C76AB', '#3BC667', '#13F42B', '#9C874A',
  ],
